author: donaldp
msg: Add in some ignores to make cvs updates cleaner.

author: donaldp
msg: Implement BlockContext.getResourceAsStream() so that a block is capable of
locating resources in the sar file. This method will retrieve the resource
regardless of where it is located.
This allows blocks to aquire resources regardless of where they are located;

author: donaldp
msg: Update build process to copy files from lib/deploy/[apps|ext] to $PHOENIX_HOME/[apps|ext] to make it easier to build and test with phoenix.
